Name: Tower Of Wishes 2: Vikings Collector's Edition (Match 3)
About the game: There was once a tower so high, it floated amongst the clouds… Or was it so high that the clouds floated amongst the tower? Regardless, it was rumoured that you could have your wishes granted if you climbed it. It was called… The Tower Of Wishes. Your Viking party was defeated in a raid, your boat was wrecked, and you washed up on an unknown island, and still, you found the Tower Of Wishes. So were you lucky or unlucky? Some of your crew, believing that the tower is Bifrost, prepare to climb it. Others have heard the whispers of an ancient tower, which grants your wish once you have climbed it… Play this modern Match-3, and experience the story of climbing the tower. And in the end, make a choice. Your choice, for the future to be. Features ✪ Get into the Viking mood! ✪ Pipe Joining, Slider, Memory, Solitaire minigame minigames ✪ 166 levels of fun match making ✪ Extra Pipe and Slider puzzles! ✪ Gameplay options can be changed anytime!
